title: Connectives & Modals Marathon
goal: Demonstrate fluent use of all connective types.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Abstraction review:

mi djuno lo du'u do gleki = ?
mi djica tu'a lo plise = ?

(Answers: I know that you're happy, I want something-involving apples)

Review Material (5-7 min)

Logical Connectives

Type And Or Examples
Sumti .e .a mi .e do
Selbri je ja barda je melbi
Bridi-tail gi'e gi'a klama gi'e cadzu
Forethought ge...gi ga...gi ge mi gi do

Negated Connectives

Cmavo Meaning
na.e A but not B
.enai B but not A
na.enai Neither A nor B

Non-Logical Connectives

Cmavo Meaning
joi Together as mass
ce Set members
ce'o Sequence

Sumtcita (Modal Tags)

Category Examples
Cause ri'a, mu'i, ki'u
Location bu'u, fa'a, to'o
Instrument pi'o, ta'i
Language bau
Result ja'e

Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Logical Connectives

Translate:

  1. I and you go.
  2. The dog is big and fast.
  3. I eat and drink.
  4. Both Alice and Bob are happy.
Answers
  1. mi .e do cu klama
  2. lo gerku cu barda je sutra
  3. mi citka gi'e pinxe
  4. ge la .alis. gi la .bob. cu gleki

Exercise 2: Sumtcita

Translate:

  1. I go because I want to.
  2. I write using a pen.
  3. I speak in Lojban.
  4. I work at home.
Answers
  1. mi klama mu'i lo nu mi djica
  2. mi ciska pi'o lo penbi
  3. mi tavla bau la .jbobau.
  4. mi gunka bu'u lo zdani

Exercise 3: Non-Logical

Translate:

  1. Alice and Bob together carry.
  2. First me, then you go.
  3. Dogs and cats and birds (set).
Answers
  1. la .alis. joi la .bob. cu bevri
  2. mi ce'o do cu klama
  3. lo gerku ce lo mlatu ce lo cipni

items.text: The dog is big and fast.
Both Alice and Bob are happy.
I go because I want to.
items.answer: `mi klama mu'i lo nu mi djica`
`lo gerku ce lo mlatu ce lo cipni`

sections.content:
Challenge (1-2 min)

Use all connective types in one paragraph:

Include: .e, je, gi'e, ge...gi, joi, and at least 2 sumtcita.

Example:

mi .e do cu gleki
.i ge la .alis. gi la .bob. cu klama gi'e gunka
.i ri barda je melbi
.i mi joi do cu citka bu'u lo zdani
.i mi citka mu'i lo nu mi xagji

Summary

You reviewed all connective types and sumtcita for connecting ideas in every way Lojban permits.

Tomorrow preview: Attitudinals and tense narrative.
